overview.en: LD2.zero is a silver-backed stablecoin. Each LD2.zero token issued is a warehouse receipt for one Troy ounce .999 fine silver, securely stored in a fully insured vault, and is fully redeemable. As the token holder, you can simply pay for shipping, and the depository will send you your silver.
overview.zh: LD2.zero是银支持的稳定币。发行的每个LD2.zero令牌都是一张仓库收据，代表一盎司的纯银，已安全地存储在完全保险的保险库中，并且可以完全赎回。作为代币持有者，您只需支付运输费用，托存处就会向您发送白银。
